title: @Riot - About K/DA and this new Universe:
body:
Honestly love this so far and can't wait to see what happens with this new line but I have some reservations and things I expect from you guys at HQ...
So the things that I expect from this New skinline:
1. Some connection to DJ Sona
2. Popstar Ahri some way or another being a Post or Pre-K/DA member.
3. Bio's for every member that is similar to how K-Pop fans write Bio's for their favs.
4. K/DA MUSIC or a FULL FLEDGED ALBUM
5. K/DA MERCH!

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Xaafira,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=aqgYNZgo,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-11-20T18:35:33.236+0000)
>
> {{champion:28}}

Where can I go to show my immense support for {{champion:28}} ?

Whenever prestige K/DA Evelynn comes out, I _will_ have it.... I only request that it stay very purple.

Gold is cool and all.... But purple
ill be disappointed if K/DA  doesnt become the KPop version of Pentakill
How many more music videos can we expect from K/DA? The first one was epic as fuck!!!!{{champion:103}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:28}}

> [{quoted}](name=Raven Masquerade,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=aqgYNZgo,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-11-03T08:22:14.720+0000)
>
> How many more music videos can we expect from K/DA? The first one was epic as fuck!!!!{{champion:103}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:28}}

I don't think there will be others music videos of them unfortunetely, even if in the lore Ahri says this is only the beginning. Riot first priority is the game after all. Pentakill also only has one music video (I think? maybe I'm wrong).

But we can always keep hoping!!! ><

I dont expect more than this one song unfortunately. Riot said it took them a good while to find the look and feel or the group to fully capture the K-Pop feel. So I doubt Riot with put any more music forward, 
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Some part of me is wont to believe K/DA is tied into the Odyssey universe... but that isn't likely in the slightest. Moreover - I think K/DA's place in the league canon is entirely nebulous; separated from lore.
We need all of that. WE NEED A MUSIC VIDEO !

so if anyone was paying attention both DJ Sona and Pentakill were shown in the train in the K/DA video. Other things that were shown was a Pizza Sivir poster, Squid Lulu on a box of Soap bubbles, and the rise music poster. One thing I didn't really understand in it was the 23 on the wall in the tunnel but w/e riot can keep its E. eggs.
THE TWENTY-THREE FLAVORS OF DR. PEPPER
Riot hinted that Cyber Pop Zoe is connected to DJ Sona, so maybe she'll be joining them too.
As a Zoe Main that has me hype
